text:
Today, I'm going to introduce a mobile application called OneFootball. OneFootball was founded in 2008 in Paris by Alex Dupont, and is now headquartered in Paris. This application is available for free to all football fans worldwide and is a reliable source of football information. I discovered this application about three years ago and I still use it every day. Thanks to this medium, I can follow the results of all professional matches in the world in real time, as well as be kept up to date with all the vital information within football.  As a supporter of the Marseille team, I am also subscribed to their account, and I can receive notifications directly if there is a goal, a red card, half-time, etc... This media is very useful to me every day and I am very happy to be able to use it.
 I think that this medium has only good consequences for its users, the majority of people who use it are fully satisfied with this application and recommend it to their friends. It brings nothing but goodwill and has become a central and serious medium in the world of football. It even manages to distinguish fakes news and warn its audience about them. I recommend this application for every football fan and hope that it can become even more emancipated.
